languages.text: {n}Заря вздрагивает всем телом, словно от удара — сквозь решетку на маске доносится кашель и летят брызги алого.{/n} "...что это? Наказание? Но за что? Я не отвергаю Предел... я... не может быть... казнить их немедленно!" {n}Заря пытается начать читать нечестивую литанию на исковерканном готике, однако собственный голос ее подводит — она заходится надрывистым, задыхающимся кашлем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Заря вздрагивает всем телом, словно от удара — сквозь решетку на маске доносится кашель и летят брызги алого.{/n} "...что это? Наказание? Но за что? Я не отвергаю Предел... я... не может быть... казнить их немедленно!" {n}Заря пытается начать читать нечестивую литанию на исковерканном готике, однако собственный голос ее подводит — она заходится надрывистым, задыхающимся кашлем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

Я не отвергаю Предел... я... не может быть... казнить их немедленно!" {n}Заря пытается начать читать нечестивую литанию на исковерканном готике, однако собственный голос ее подводит — она заходится надрывистым, задыхающимся кашлем.{/n}

I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auroras gesamter Körper zuckt zusammen, als wäre sie geschlagen worden. Sie hustet und ein roter Regen spritzt durch die Gitter ihrer Maske.{/n} "Was ... was ist das? Eine Strafe? Aber wofür? Ich habe dem Rand nicht abgeschworen ... ich ... das kann nicht sein ... Richtet sie sofort hin!" {n}Aurora versucht, eine unheilige Litanei in gebrochenem Gotisch zu rezitieren. Ihre Stimme versagt jedoch und sie bekommt einen derart heftigen Hustenanfall, dass sie kaum mehr atmen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aurora zuckt mit ihrem ganzen Körper zusammen, als sei sie geschlagen worden. Sie hustet und ein roter Regen spritzt durch die Gitter ihrer Maske.{/n} "Was ... was ist das? Eine Strafe? Aber wofür? Ich habe dem Rand nicht abgeschworen ... ich ... das kann nicht sein ... Richtet sie sofort hin!" {n}Aurora versucht, eine unheilige Litanei in gebrochenem Gotisch zu rezitieren. Ihre Stimme versagt jedoch und sie bekommt einen derart heftigen Hustenanfall, dass sie kaum mehr atmen kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout le corps d'Aurore tressaille, comme sous l'effet d'un coup. Une quinte de toux envoie un éclat pourpre à travers la grille de son masque.{/n} « Que... Qu'est-ce que cela ? Un châtiment ? Mais pour quoi... Je n'ai pas renoncé à la Lame, je... c'est impossible... vais m'en acquitter sur-le-champ ! » {n}Aurore tente de réciter une litanie impie en gothique rudimentaire, mais sa propre voix lui fait défaut lorsqu'elle est prise d'une violente quinte de toux qui l'empêche presque de respirer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout le corps d'Aurore chancelle, comme sous l'effet d'un coup. Une quinte de toux envoie un éclat pourpre à travers les barres de son masque.{/n} « Que... Qu'est-ce que cela ? Un châtiment ? Mais pour quoi... Je n'ai pas renoncé à la Lame, je... c'est impossible... vais m'en acquitter sur le champ ! » {n}Aurore tente de réciter une litanie impie en gothique rudimentaire, mais sa propre voix lui fait défaut lorsqu'elle est prise d'une violente quinte de toux qui l'empêche presque de respirer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，“极光”浑身抽搐起来，仿佛遭到了无形一击。她咳嗽起来，从面具的格栅中喷出了一口鲜血。{/n}“这……这是什么？惩罚？可为什么要惩罚我？我没有背弃锋刃……我……不，这不可能……立刻处决他们！”{n}“极光”试图用支离破碎的哥特语吟诵邪恶的祷文，但一串剧烈的咳嗽堵住了她的嘴，让她几乎无法呼吸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，“极光”浑身抽搐着，仿佛遭到了无形一击。她咳嗽起来，从面具的孔洞喷出了一口鲜血。{/n}“这……这是什么？惩罚？可为什么要惩罚我？我没有背弃锋刃……我……不，这不可能……立刻处决他们！”{n}“极光”试图用支离破碎的哥特语吟诵邪恶的祷文，但一串剧烈的咳嗽堵住了她的嘴，让她几乎无法呼吸。{/n}

languages.text: {n}オーロラは殴られたかのように全身を震わせる。彼女が咳き込むと、仮面の隙間から緋色の飛沫が飛び散った。{/n}「何だ…これは？罰…？だが、理由は？私は暁の刃を投げ出してなど…私は…そんなはず…今すぐ奴らを処刑せよ！」{n}オーロラはメチャクチャな帝国語で不浄の連祷を唱えようとするものの、不意に激しく咳き込んで体を震わせる。息も絶え絶えとなり、その声は届かなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オーロラは打たれたように全身を震わせる。咳き込むと、仮面の隙間から緋色の飛沫が飛び散った。{/n}「何だ…これは？罰…？だが、理由は？私は暁の刃を投げ出してなど…私は…そんなはず…今すぐ奴らを処刑せよ！」{n}オーロラはメチャクチャな帝国語で不浄の連祷を唱えようとするものの、突然激しく咳き込んで体を震わし、息も絶え絶えで、その声は届かなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aurora recula como si la hubieran golpeado. Una tos sanguinolenta atraviesa la rejilla de su máscara.{/n} «¿Qué... qué es esto? ¿Un castigo? ¿Pero por qué? No he renunciado al Filo... esto no puede ser... ¡Ejecutadlos de una vez!». {n}Aurora intenta recitar una letanía impía en gótico roto, pero su propia voz le falla mientras es sacudida por un violento ataque de tos hasta que apenas puede respirar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aurora hace un gesto de dolor con todo el cuerpo, como si la hubieran golpeado. Una tos sanguinolenta salpica los barrotes de su máscara.{/n} "¿Qué... qué es esto? ¿Un castigo? ¿Pero por qué? No he renunciado al Filo... esto no puede ser... ¡Ejecutadlos de una vez!». {n}Aurora intenta recitar una letanía impía en gótico roto, pero su propia voz le falla mientras es sacudida por un violento ataque de tos hasta que apenas puede respirar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aurora'nın tüm vücudu, elektrik çarpmışçasına seğiriyor. Öksürüğünün ardından maskesinin ızgaralarından kızıllık akıyor.{/n} "Ne? Bu da ne? Ceza mı? Neyin cezası? Reddettiğim Tan Vakti değildi... Ben... Olamaz... Topunu infaz edin!" {n}Aurora, çat pat Gotik lisanıyla habis bir dua okumaya çalışıyor ancak şiddetli bir öksürük krizi geçirerek neredeyse nefessiz kalması üzerine sesi, onu yarı yolda bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aurora's entire body flinches as if she has been struck. A cough sends a scarlet spatter through the grille of her mask.{/n} "What— what is this? Punishment? But for what? I have not renounced the Edge— I— this cannot be— execute them at once!" {n}Aurora attempts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic, but her own voice fails her as she is shaken by a violent coughing fit until she can barely breathe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aurora'nın tüm vücudu, elektrik çarpmışçasına seğiriyor. Öksürüğünün ardından maskesinin ızgaralarından kızıllık akıyor.{/n} "Ne? Bu da ne? Ceza mı? Neyin cezası? Reddettiğim Tan Vakti değildi... Ben... Olamaz... Topunu infaz edin!" {n}Aurora, çat pat Gotik bilgisini kullanarak habis bir ayin gerçekleştirmeye çalışıyor ancak şiddetli bir öksürük krizi geçirerek neredeyse nefessiz kalması üzerine sesi, onu yarı yolda bırakıyor.{/n}
